title: Twitter Player
summary: If you post a link to your pinecast.co site on Twitter, your tweet will have a little player! Available for all paid plans.

title: Vote for features
summary: Let us know what we could do better. Click the feedback link in the header to vote on new features.

title: Private episodes
summary: Episodes can be marked as private. Private episodes are available to paid listeners (via the tip jar) as a private feed on their subscription page.
